name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Threat Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in security solutions, I specialize in leveraging advanced skills in **CI/CD**, **AWS**, **Azure**, **Cloud Security**, **Active Directory**, **Okta**, **SAML**, **OAuth**, **JWT**, **Splunk**, and **CrowdStrike**. My background includes building robust systems to enhance threat detection and incident response through automation, and applying analytical skills for thorough threat investigations and telemetry validation.
I have a proven track record of developing enterprise-grade platforms across diverse sectors, utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. My deep cloud experience with **Azure**, **AWS**, and **GCP** complements my expertise in compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS.
Additionally, I possess strong communication skills that facilitate collaboration across teams to implement effective security measures. My technical acumen includes developing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow** and **Kubeflow**, ensuring high-performance and secure applications.
